alert.note: Alert for Ector; Ward; Winkler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Ector, north central Ward and Winkler Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 531 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Kermit, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kermit, Wink, Winkler County Airport and Monahans Sandhills State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western Texas.
